verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] congratulating the Washington Capitals hockey team for winning the Stanley Cup .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: congratulating] [ARG1: the Washington Capitals hockey team] [ARG2: for winning the Stanley Cup] .
President Donald Trump is congratulating [ARG0: the Washington Capitals hockey team] for [V: winning] [ARG1: the Stanley Cup] .
